HomePage.title: See the World Differently
HomePage.subtitle: Handcrafted eyewear that doesn't compromise—premium quality, honest prices, delivered to your door.

Hero.tagline: Your eyes deserve better than generic frames from crowded stores. We craft precision eyewear for people who notice the difference.

StoryHero.description: Experience crystal-clear vision with handcrafted frames designed for people who refuse to compromise on quality or style.

Products.sectionDescription: From morning meetings to late-night reading—glasses that keep up with you, not the other way around.

Bento.sectionDescription: No shortcuts. No compromises. Every frame is engineered for comfort, durability, and crystal-clear vision.
Bento.crystalDescription: Edge-to-edge clarity that makes you forget you're wearing glasses. No blur, no strain, just pure sight.
Bento.impactDescription: Aerospace-grade materials that survive real life.
Bento.deliveryDescription: Free shipping over ৳1500. Track your order from our studio to your hands.

WhyClearr.sectionDescription: We're not another eyewear brand. We're opticians, designers, and perfectionists who got tired of overpriced, underwhelming glasses.
WhyClearr.freeDeliveryDesc: Free delivery on orders over ৳2000. No hidden fees, no surprises at checkout.
WhyClearr.qualityDesc: Premium hinges. Anti-scratch coating. Lenses that stay clear for years.
WhyClearr.returnsDesc: Wrong fit? Changed your mind? Full refund or exchange within 7 days.

QuizCTA.title: Not Sure What Power
QuizCTA.description: Skip the guesswork. Our quick quiz analyzes your reading habits and screen time to recommend the perfect lens strength.

Trust.title: 5,000+ Happy Eyes
Trust.description: We let our customers do the talking. Here's what they think about their new glasses.

FinalCTA.title: Ready to see clearly?
FinalCTA.description: Join thousands who've made the switch. Quality eyewear shouldn't cost a fortune.

Footer.virtualTryOnDesc: Wondering how they'll look? Our AR mirror lets you try on any frame in seconds—no download needed.

MegaMenu.shopCollectionDesc: Premium eyewear designed for people who spend their lives on screens—and still want to look good.
MegaMenu.readingGlassesDesc: For books, newspapers, and fine print.
MegaMenu.sunglassesDesc: Full UV protection, zero compromise on style.
MegaMenu.computerGlassesDesc: End eye strain. Work longer, feel better.
MegaMenu.virtualTryOnDesc: See any frame on your face using your camera. Coming Soon.
MegaMenu.findPowerDesc: Don't know your power? We'll help you figure it out.
MegaMenu.theJournalDesc: Eye care tips, style guides, and stories from our workshop.
MegaMenu.ourStoryDesc: How a small team in Dhaka is changing how Bangladesh sees.

MobileNav.whatsappDesc: Chat with a real person. Our team responds within minutes.

About.heroDescription: We believe great eyewear shouldn't require a prescription for your wallet. Advanced lenses, timeless design, fair prices.
About.missionP1: We noticed something strange: people spend 8+ hours a day staring at screens, yet most glasses are designed for a different era. They're either medical-looking or overpriced fashion statements.
About.missionP2: Smart Reading exists to fix that. We make glasses that look good, feel invisible on your face, and actually protect your eyes from the digital world—all without the designer markup.
About.coreValuesDesc: These aren't corporate buzzwords. This is how we make decisions.

Contact.subtitle: Need help choosing a frame? Questions about your order?
Contact.subtitleLine2: We respond within 2 hours during business days.

Shop.title: All Glasses

Shop.noProductsDesc: We couldn't find anything in this category.

Testimonials.review1: Honestly skeptical about buying glasses online. But these? Perfect fit, premium feel, and half the price of my usual optician. I'm converted.
Testimonials.review2: These don't look like reading glasses—they look like expensive designer frames. Incredibly lightweight too. Best purchase I've made in months.
Testimonials.review3: Used to get splitting headaches after long coding sessions. A week with these blue light glasses and the difference is night and day.
